pageContext.claim: “I endorsed him [Georgia Gov. Brian Kemp}. He was in last place. And I endorsed him. He went to first place very, like immediately, and then he won the primary, and then I gave him a couple of rallies, which I don't like doing for other people.”
pageContext.analysis: Gabriel Sterling, a Republican elections official in Georgia, tweeted in response to this comment when Trump repeated two days later: "No @realDonaldTrump, @BrianKempGA was already ahead in the polls in the @GaRepublicans Primary Runoff. He wasn't in 4th as you stated, since it was a runoff there were, in fact, only 2 candidates in that race. That's how runoffs work."
